name: OR_LOG_SECOND_INDICATION
description: This table stores the secondary indication for the procedure.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SECONDARY_INDICATION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the secondary indication for the procedure performed.
